settings.title: Swedish Grace to Functionalism
settings.body: Swedish Grace bridged Art Deco and functionalism, favoring quiet patterning and pale woods that still inform Nordic interiors.

settings.title: Danish modern warm serifs
settings.body: Designers like Finn Juhl and Alvar Aalto emphasized organic lines, warm woods, and tactile textiles aligned with human scale.

settings.title: Soft modernism
settings.body: Finnish architects softened brutalist frames with pine, leather, and earthy ceramics; Marimekko prints added warmth.

settings.title: New Scandinavian minimalism
settings.body: Brands like Muuto and Hay emerged with playful silhouettes, muted pastels, and democratic pricing.

settings.title: New Nordic calm
settings.body: Studios blend hygge principles with sustainability: plinth tables, limewashed walls, and softened daylight photography.

settings.headline: Nordic Minimalism Style
settings.copy: A calm composition for showcasing understated craft.
